This is a little project I whipped up in my spare timeâ€”hope it brings you some joy! ## ğŸ¯ Game Intro 2048 is a simple yet addictive number-merging game. On a 4x4 grid, swipe up, down, left, or right to merge tiles with the same number. The goal? Reach 2048 (but hey, you can keep going for even higher scores)! **How to play:** - Use arrow keys or WASD to move the tiles. - When two tiles with the same number collide, they merge into one. - After each move, a new 2 or 4 will randomly appear in an empty spot. - The game ends when there are no more moves left. ## âœ¨ Special Features ### 1. Undo Function - Made a wrong move? No worries! - Just hit the "Undo" button to go back one step. - You can undo as many times as you like, all the way back to the start. - Never let a slip of the finger ruin your game again! ### 2. Secret Cheat Mode - Enter the magic sequence: â†â†â†’â†’ â†’â†’â†â† (left, left, right, right, right, right, left, left) - All tiles will magically turn into 128! - Itâ€™s an Easter egg, just for fun. - Pro tip: Cheating is fun, but donâ€™t overdo it! ğŸ˜‰ ## ğŸ¯ Demo ğŸ¯ Play here: [http://2048.ct8.pl](http://2048.ct8.pl:9969/) ## ğŸ“ Project Structure

RowTranslations.originContent: An enhanced version of the classic 2048 game, now with even more fun features! This is a little project I whipped up in my spare timeâ€”hope it brings you some joy!

2048 is a simple yet addictive number-merging game. On a 4x4 grid, swipe up, down, left, or right to merge tiles with the same number. The goal? Reach 2048 (but hey, you can keep going for even higher scores)!
- Use arrow keys or WASD to move the tiles.
- When two tiles with the same number collide, they merge into one.
- After each move, a new 2 or 4 will randomly appear in an empty spot.
- The game ends when there are no more moves left.
- Made a wrong move? No worries!
- Just hit the "Undo" button to go back one step.
- You can undo as many times as you like, all the way back to the start.
- Never let a slip of the finger ruin your game again!
- Enter the magic sequence: â†â†â†’â†’ â†’â†’â†â† (left, left, right, right,  right, right, left, left)
- All tiles will magically turn into 128!
- Itâ€™s an Easter egg, just for fun.
- Pro tip: Cheating is fun, but donâ€™t overdo it! ğŸ˜‰

Content:
**File Descriptions:**
- `2048.py`: Backend server written with Flask, handles game logic and API requests.
- `script.js`: Frontend game logic, including moves, animations, and special features.
- `styles.css`: Game styles, making sure everything looks nice and responsive.
- `index.html`: The main page that brings everything together.

## ğŸš€ Getting Started

**Method 1: Download Release**
1. Download the latest release.
2. Make sure you have Python 3.x installed.
3. Install dependencies: `pip install flask`
4. Run: `python 2048.py`
5. Open your browser and go to: [http://localhost:9969](http://localhost:9969)

**Method 2: Clone from GitHub**

## ğŸ¨ Customization

Want to make it your own? Tweak `styles.css` for a new look, or dive into `script.js` to change up the gameplay. All code is well-commented for easy hacking!
